example_measures.name: BreastCancerScreening
example_measures.title: Breast Cancer Screening
example_measures.description: Percentage of women 50-74 years of age who had a mammogram to screen for breast cancer in the 27 months prior to the end of the measurement period.

example_measures.name: ColorectalCancerScreening
example_measures.title: Colorectal Cancer Screening
example_measures.description: Percentage of adults 50-75 years of age who had appropriate screening for colorectal cancer.

example_measures.name: DiabetesHbA1cControl
example_measures.title: Diabetes: Hemoglobin A1c Poor Control
example_measures.description: Percentage of patients 18-75 years of age with diabetes who had hemoglobin A1c > 9.0% during the measurement period.

example_measures.name: ControllingHighBloodPressure
example_measures.title: Controlling High Blood Pressure
example_measures.description: Percentage of patients 18-85 years of age who had a diagnosis of hypertension and whose blood pressure was adequately controlled during the measurement period.

example_measures.name: DepressionScreening
example_measures.title: Depression Screening and Follow-Up
example_measures.description: Percentage of patients aged 12 years and older screened for depression using an age-appropriate standardized tool AND follow-up plan documented.

example_measures.name: TobaccoUseScreening
example_measures.title: Preventive Care and Screening: Tobacco Use
example_measures.description: Percentage of patients aged 18 years and older who were screened for tobacco use and received cessation intervention if identified as a tobacco user.

example_measures.name: FallsScreening
example_measures.title: Falls: Screening for Future Fall Risk
example_measures.description: Percentage of patients 65 years of age and older who were screened for future fall risk during the measurement period.

example_measures.name: MedicationReconciliation
example_measures.title: Medication Reconciliation Post-Discharge
example_measures.description: Percentage of discharges from any inpatient facility for which the discharge medication list was reconciled with the current medication list.
